A quick (and dirty) port of the [http://plugins.intellij.net/plugin/?idea&id=96 TestDox] plugin, with additional support for navigating between ruby src/test.

{{{
class ToggleClassTest < PMIPAction
   def run(event, context)
     from = context.editor_filepath
     to = toggle_to(from)
     return if to.nil?
     elements = Elements.new(context).find_file(to)
     if elements.size == 1
       Navigator.new(context).open(elements.first)
     else
       if Dialogs.new(context).yes_no('Test not found', 'Would you like to create a test for this class?')
         to.write_lines([])
         Refresh.file_system { Navigator.new(context).open(Elements.new(context).find_file(to).first) }
       end
     end
     result("#{from.name} -> #{to.name}")
   end

   def toggle_to(from)
     case from.extension.downcase
     when 'java'
       from.ends?('Test.java') ? from.replace('Test.java', '.java').replace('/test/', '/src/') :
         from.replace('.java', 'Test.java').replace('/src/', '/test/')
     when 'rb'
       from.name.include?('test_') ? from.replace('/test_', '/').replace('/test/', '/lib/') :
         from.replace("/#{from.name}", "/test_#{from.name}").replace('/lib/', '/test/')
     end
   end
end

bind 'ctrl alt shift T', ToggleClassTest.new
}}}
